title: Definitions: Choice, Composite, List, Independents.
description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate keys/objects used in describing Choice, Composite, List, Independents (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).

itemsDetected.title: Definition: items
itemsDetected.description: True when the object includes items key and value of items is an array containing at least 1 item, which can be a specificResource, an externalWebResource, a uri, a textualBody or another choice/set (Sections 3.2.7 and 3.2.8).

choiceTypeDefinition.title: Definition: Choice type
choiceTypeDefinition.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'Choice' (Section 3.2.7)

compositeTypeDefinition.title: Definition: Choice type
compositeTypeDefinition.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'Composite' (Section 3.2.7)

listTypeDefinition.title: Definition: Choice type
listTypeDefinition.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'List' (Section 3.2.7)

independentsTypeDefinition.title: Definition: Choice type
independentsTypeDefinition.description: True when object has type key and object's type is 'Independents' (Section 3.2.7)

choiceDetected.title: Definition: Choice
choiceDetected.description: True when object's type is 'Choice' and the object has an items array (Section 3.2.7)

compositeDetected.title: Definition: Composite
compositeDetected.description: True when object's type is 'Composite' and the object has at items array (Section 3.2.8)

listDetected.title: Definition: List
listDetected.description: True when object's type is 'List' and the object has at items array (Section 3.2.7)

independentsDetected.title: Definition: Independents
independentsDetected.description: True when object's type is 'Independents' and the object has at items array (Section 3.2.7)
